Module jBomberman
Package controller

Class KeyListenerGame

java.lang.Object
controller.KeyListenerGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class KeyListenerGame extends Object implements KeyListener
Personalized version of a KeyListener to manage inputs reception during a game session (running ThreadGame).

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static KeyListenerGame getInstance()
      singleton's instance getter
      Returns:
      this singleton's instance

    • isPerformAction

      public boolean isPerformAction()
      Getter of action condition. KeyListenerGame's action can provoke a bomb release. This getter exhausts its signal in order to conform the Controller to User's digital experience.
      Returns:
      conditional signal of action

    • isTriggerAction

      public boolean isTriggerAction()
      Getter of trigger condition. KeyListenerGame's trigger can provoke a bomb explosion only if ReleaseBehavior is set to BombRemote. This getter exhausts its signal in order to conform the Controller to User's digital experience.
      Returns:
      conditional signal of trigger

    • isPaused

      public boolean isPaused()
      Getter of pause condition. KeyListenerGame's pause changes GameState from StatePlaying to StatePaused and vice versa. This getter exhausts its signal in order to conform the Controller to User's digital experience.
      Returns:
      conditional signal of pause

    • isEnter

      public boolean isEnter()
      Getter of enter condition. KeyListenerGame's enter activates the commands of options selection if the current GameState owns it. This getter exhausts its signal in order to conform the Controller to User's digital experience.
      Returns:
      conditional signal of enter

    • resetPerformAction

      public void resetPerformAction()
      This resetter forces action to false.

    • resetPause

      public void resetPause()
      This resetter forces pause to false.

    • resetEnter

      public void resetEnter()
      This resetter forces enter to false.

    • setPause

      public void setPause(boolean pause)
      Setter of pause.
      Parameters:
      pause - new pause value

    • containsDir

      public boolean containsDir()
      Check if there is at least one direction inside the register.
      Returns:
      true if register isn't empty.

    • getDir

      public Dir getDir()
      Get the latest direction inserted into the register. If many directions are contained only the latest one is considered.
      Returns:
      most recent direction
